00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 
00037 #include "IMB_imbuf_types.h"
00038 #include "IMB_imbuf.h"
00039 #include "IMB_filetype.h"
00040 
00041 #include "imbuf.h"
00042 
00043 short IMB_saveiff(struct ImBuf *ibuf, const char *name, int flags)
00044 {
00045     ImFileType *type;
00046 
00047     if (ibuf == NULL) return (FALSE);
00048     ibuf->flags = flags;
00049 
00050     for (type=IMB_FILE_TYPES; type->is_a; type++) {
00051         if (type->save && type->ftype(type, ibuf)) {
00052             if (!(type->flag & IM_FTYPE_FLOAT)) {
00053                 if (ibuf->rect==NULL && ibuf->rect_float)
00054                     IMB_rect_from_float(ibuf);
00055             }
00056             return type->save(ibuf, name, flags);
00057         }
00058     }
00059 
00060     fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't save picture.\n");
00061 
00062     return FALSE;
00063 }
